data.title: Denver Nuggets Team News, Fixtures and Results
data.meta_description: Get the latest Denver Nuggets news, team updates, fixtures and results right here.
data.text:
Timberwolves drop Game 1 of NBA's Western Conference Finals to Dallas, 108-105, after Minnesota's Democrat Gov. dropped some secret trash talk

Popularized by Minnesota Timberwolves star Anthony Edwards, the phrase 'Bring Ya A**' was surreptitiously included into a proclamation by Governor Tim Walz on Wednesday before the Game 1 loss.

Timberwolves star Anthony Edwards' viral response to Charles Barkley takes over Minnesota's tourism website ahead of Mavericks series

Timberwolves star Anthony Edwards' viral response to Charles Barkley has become the new slogan for Minnesota's tourism website as the team gears up for the Western Conference Finals.

Jordyn Woods celebrates Timberwolves boyfriend Karl-Anthony Towns after Minnesota eliminates the Nuggets: 'Goodbye Denver'

Model and socialite Jordyn Woods took time to celebrate her boyfriend and Minnesota Timberwolves star Karl-Anthony Towns.

LeBron James 'will NOT have any input in the Lakers' search for a new coach' despite LA's reported interest in his podcast co-host and friend JJ Redick

The Los Angeles Lakers' next head coach will be chosen by the team's front office and not LeBron James, according to The Athletic's Shams Charania.

Angry Nuggets coach Michael Malone blasts reporters' 'stupid a** questions' after his Denver team lost to the Timberwolves in Game 7

Nuggets coach Michael Malone blasted reporters for their 'stupid a** questions' after his team blew a 20-point lead to the Timberwolves during Game 7 of the Western Conference Semifinals.

Anthony Edwards and Nikola Jokic clash after Timberwolves star trolled Nuggets fans at end of Minnesota's sensational comeback to win Game 7

The Timberwolves roared back from a 20-point second-half deficit to eliminate the reigning NBA champion Denver Nuggets 98-90 in a Game 7 Minnesota masterpiece on Sunday night.

Shannon Sharpe addresses Shaquille O'Neal feud after NBA legend insisted ex-NFL star is 'way beneath' him

After Denver Nuggets star Nikola Jokic was crowned MVP for the third time in four years, O'Neal openly objected - telling the Joker that Oklahoma City's Shai Gilgeous-Alexander was more deserving.

Lebron James returns to Cleveland with his wife Savannah as they take courtside seats for Celtics-Cavs - after Lakers crashed out of NBA playoffs

James, who can opt out of his contact with the Lakers and become a free agent this summer, played two stints in Cleveland. He led the Cavs to their only NBA title in 2016 before leaving two years later.

Los Angeles Lakers 'are intrigued by top ESPN analyst in their search for a new head coach'... despite him not having ANY prior experience!

After getting eliminated by the Denver Nuggets in a gentleman's sweep in the opening round, the Lakers bid farewell to former coach Darvin Ham, thus leaving them in search of candidates.

Anthony Edwards reveals why he does NOT want to be compared to Michael Jordan

Minnesota Timberwolves star Anthony Edwards has revealed why he does not want to be compared to Michael Jordan, who is regarded as one of the best basketball players of all-time.

Shaquille O'Neal tears into Shannon Sharpe for criticizing awkward Nikola Jokic interview - days after NBA icon's cryptic reply to ex-wife worried fans

O'Neal sparked controversy earlier this week after telling Jokic, who was recently crowned NBA MVP for the third time in four years, that Shai Gilgeous-Alexander should have won instead.

Watch furious Nuggets coach Michael Malone SCREAM in referee's face as defending NBA champions fall in playoffs to the Timberwolves again

An irate Denver Nuggets head coach Michael Malone was caught screaming in the face of referee Marc Davis - on a night where his team went down 2-0 in their series against the Timberwolves.

LeBron James is told to RETIRE by Kendrick Perkins as ESPN analyst insists Lakers star is hurting his legacy and GOAT argument by playing on

On Monday's edition of First Take, Perkins went on a tangent about how James is hurting his legacy by prolonging his career despite playing well for his age.

Controversial technical called on Anthony Edwards for STARING as fans and commentators slam referees and 'unwatchable' NBA

The Timberwolves' poster boy was whistled for a technical foul in the third quarter when he merely stared down Denver's Reggie Jackson after making a layup.

Lakers 'fire coach Darvin Ham over the PHONE after NBA playoffs exit... with JJ Redick among candidates to join LA'

Reports claim that the search for a replacement will soon begin, with Mike Budenholzer, Kenny Atkinson, JJ Redick and Clippers coach Ty Lue among the names in the frame.

Aw nuts! Watch moment referee gets hit in the CROTCH with the ball during the Pacers' elimination of the Bucks

A referee got hit in the crotch with the ball during Thursday night's Game 6 between the Indiana Pacers and the Milwaukee Bucks. The official, Justin Van Duyne, cowered over in pain after.

LeBron James enjoys a car ride with son Bronny amid claims the Lakers are ready to draft the 19-year-old to keep his dad in LA

The elder James, 39, shared a clip of himself in a grey hoodie and velvet cap while jamming to some music on his Instagram Story, as Bronny appeared to be behind the wheel.

Jevon Porter, younger brother of Nuggets star Michael Porter Jr. and now-banned Jontay Porter, arrested on suspicion of DWI

Jevon Porter, the younger brother of Denver Nuggets star Michael Porter Jr. and banned-from-the-NBA Jontay Porter, was arrested Saturday on suspicion of DWI in his hometown in Missouri.

Angry LeBron James says dismal Lakers couldn't 'hit the side of a cow's a**' after playoff loss to Denver as son Bryce trolls coach Darvin Ham

On the latest episode of James and JJ Redick's Mind the Game podcast, released on Wednesday, the pair discussed how three-point shooting drastically changed basketball.

Lakers 'are open to the prospect of drafting LeBron James' son Bronny to persuade the legend to stay in LA'

'I haven't given it much thought lately' said the veteran forward when asked about the possibility of playing alongside his 19-year-old son after the Lakers' playoff elimination loss to the Nuggets.

LeBron James is in no rush to decide his NBA future as Lakers desperately try to re-sign their star player - who also wants to wait and see if son Bronny gets drafted

The Lakers star, who refused to confirm whether he'll leave the franchise after the team's stunning loss to the Denver Nuggets Monday night, is preparing for a 'wild' few weeks of negotiations.

LA Mayor embarrassingly deletes tweet about the Lakers' playoff loss to the Nuggets after backlash from fans

The Lakers won the inaugural NBA In-Season Tournament in December. Although it added another trophy to their case, it holds nowhere as much value as the team's 17 NBA titles.

Lakers coach Darvin Ham 'expected to be fired' after elimination from the playoffs as Los Angeles faces the prospect of losing their head coach and LeBron James this offseason

In the NBA, job security is relatively flimsy and it appears Los Angeles Lakers head coach Darvin Ham is expected to see the tough end of that soon.

LeBron James hints at Lakers exit as LA icon refuses to confirm if he's played his last game for the team after NBA playoff exit against the Denver Nuggets: 'I'm not going to answer that'

The Lakers were beaten 108-106 in the dying seconds by the Nuggets on Monday night, which condemned them to a 4-1 series loss and ended their playoff hopes for another year.

LeBron James and the Lakers are OUT of the NBA playoffs as last-gasp Jamal Murray two-pointer earns Denver Nuggets 108-106 victory and sends LA packing for the second straight year

Knowing a win was required to keep the series alive at 3-1 down, LeBron put up 30 points as he desperately tried to pull the Lakers over the line.

Singer Olivia O'Brien reveals SHE had the viral 'boob incident' at Lakers NBA game on Saturday - before telling her new fans to listen to her latest song!

Singer Olivia O'Brien has claimed she was the woman who inadvertently went viral with NBA fans because of a 'boob moment' when she was watching the Lakers beat the Denver Nuggets.

LeBron James and the Lakers keep their NBA playoff hopes alive as LA's star man puts up 30 points in 119-108 win over the Nuggets to reduce series deficit to 3-1 and set up crucial fifth game

LeBron James scored 30 points to help the Los Angeles Lakers stave off elimination with a 119-108 win over the Denver Nuggets on Saturday night in Game 4 of a Western Conference playoff series.

LeBron James EXPLODES on Lakers coach Darvin Ham for not challenging out-of-bounds call in Nuggets playoff game... but controversial moment doesn't prove costly in vital win

Almost six minutes into the fourth quarter, television cameras captured a seething LeBron urging the Lakers to challenge the call after he was deemed to have knocked the ball out of play.

Nikola Jokic's brother appears to PUNCH a fan in the face after Nuggets' comeback win over Lakers - as Denver Police appeal for people to come forward and NBA investigate incident

Police have appealed for people to come forward after video emerged that appears to show one of the brothers of Denver Nuggets star Nikola Jokic punching a fan in Monday's playoff game.

Jamal Murray sinks game-winning BUZZER BEATER as Nuggets erase 20-point second-half deficit against LeBron James' Lakers to pull out 101-99 win and push series lead to 2-0

Jamal Murray sank a stunning buzzer beater on Monday night to give the Nuggets a 2-0 series lead over LeBron James' Lakers.

NBA star can't escape the Minions in hilarious new trailer for 'Despicable Me 4'... after fans claimed he looked like Steve Carell's iconic character Gru

The outfit he wore appeared to be a tease to his appearance in a promotion for Despicable Me 4, where he seeks therapy because the Minions think he's their boss.

Denver Nuggets star Michael Porter Jr. says teammates 'had his back' after brutal week saw one of his brothers jailed for drunk driving crash and other sibling banned from the NBA amid betting scandal

Michael Porter Jr. said Saturday night that his teammates 'had his back' after an awful week for his family saw younger brother Coban Porter sentenced to six years in prison.

Coban Porter, brother of Denver Nuggets star Michael Porter Jr. and recently-banned Jontay, sentenced to six years in prison for a drunk driving crash that resulted in a woman's death

Coban Porter, a brother of Nuggets star Michael Porter Jr. and recently banned Jontay Porter, was sentenced to six years in prison from a drunk driving crash, resulting in a woman's death.

Brooklyn Nets 'appointing Sacramento Kings' assistant Jordi Fernandez as new head coach'... ending month-long search for Jacque Vaughn's replacement after disastrous season

On Monday night, sources told ESPN's Adrian Wojnarowski that the Nets are now prepared to hire Fernandez two months after firing former head coach Jacque Vaughn.

Social media explodes after NBA star Michael Porter Jr announces porn star Lana Rhoades as his latest podcast guest: 'Most unexpected collab ever'

Denver Nuggets star Michael Porter Jr has left fans stunned by the latest guest on his 'Curious Mike' podcast - the former adult entertainer Lana Rhoades.

NBA gambling scandal: Michael Porter Jr. insists brother Jontay wouldn't 'do anything to put his basketball career in jeopardy' as the league investigates suspicious bets on recent performances by Raptors forward

Denver Nuggets star Michael Porter Jr. refuses to believe his younger brother Jontay would jeopardize his NBA career by getting mixed up in suspicious gambling activity.

Toronto Raptors forward Jontay Porter 'under investigation by the NBA over gambling irregularities on prop betting involving him through the course of three months'

The NBA has opened up an investigation into Toronto Raptors forward Jontay Porter over suspected betting irregularities over the course of several months.

Dallas Mavericks are paying to fly out a private chef to cook vegan meals for Kyrie Irving... as the star point guard continues observing Ramadan during the NBA season

The Dallas Mavericks are going above and beyond for star point guard Kyrie Irving - as he continues to play for the team while also fasting as part of his observance of the Muslim holiday of Ramadan.

Patrick Mahomes swaps the NFL for NBA as he lauds Kyrie Irving's 'greatness' and swaps jerseys with Luka Doncic after taking in the Dallas Mavericks' buzzer-beater win over the Denver Nuggets

The Chiefs QB, who hails from Tyler, Texas - an hour-and-a-half drive from Dallas - was at American Airlines Center on Sunday, as he continues to enjoy the offseason after winning his third Super Bowl.

Mavs' Kyrie Irving sinks SENSATIONAL one-handed buzzer beater to hold off Nikola Jokic and the Denver Nuggets as Dallas rookie admits 'when we see him get the ball, we sit back and watch'

Kyrie Irving sank the defending-champion Denver Nuggets with a sensational one-handed floater that NBA reporter Kevin O'Connor called 'one of the greatest game winners you'll ever see.'

NBA-champion Denver Nuggets pass on visiting Joe Biden's White House because they're 'prioritizing the playoff race'... but Charles Barkley isn't buying it: 'You should go, but these guys act like they're flying Southwest'

Denver Nuggets are skipping the customary White House visit for reigning NBA champions, but they're not making a political statement against the Biden Administration.

Nuggets outlast Celtics in possible NBA Finals preview, 115-109, as Nikola Jokic stars with 32-point triple-double

In a potential NBA Finals preview, the Nuggets beat the Celtics on Thursday night, defeating their Eastern Conference foes 115-109.

LeBron James becomes the first player in NBA history to score 40,000 points as Lakers superstar extends his record as league's leading scorer in front of sold out Crypto.com Arena

The NBA legend reached the milestone during the second quarter of Los Angeles Lakers' game against the Denver Nuggets at Crypto.com Arena, hitting a scoop layup off the glass.

Stephen Curry fails to score a first-half point for the first time in FIVE YEARS against the Wizards... before adding 18 after the interval to help the Warriors claim 123-112 win

Curry was held scoreless in the first half for the first time in the regular season since November 23, 2012, when he drew blank against the Denver Nuggets.

Nikola Jokic becomes just the third player in NBA history to record a triple-double against EVERY opponent... as his adorable daughter Ognjena blows him a kiss from her seat

Nikola Jokic made history on Thursday night, becoming just the third player in NBA history to record at least one triple-double against every opponent in the league.

Nikola Jokic's adorable daughter Ognjena steals the show at Avalanche game as she applauds while the Nuggets star receives 'MVP' chants from the Colorado crowd

Ognjena also appeared to enjoy herself as she was seen smiling and clapping with the crowd. Another clip showed a different angle of her standing on Nikola's lap.

NBA 'on track to break attendance and sellout records'... and TEN teams have sold out every home game this season

Ten teams have sold out every home game this season, Sportico reported. They include the Celtics, Nuggets, Golden State Warriors, Philadelphia 76ers, Phoenix Suns and Sacramento Kings.

Nikola Jokic believes Spurs star Victor Wembanyama is going to 'change' basketball... NBA All-Star tells fans: 'We just need to give him time and witness it'

Denver Nuggets center Nikola Jokic has heaped praise on San Antonio Spurs star Victor Wembanyama, claiming the Frenchman will 'change' the game of basketball.

Pau Gasol comforts the late Kobe Bryant's daughter Natalia as they watch the Lakers play after ceremony honoring her father with a statue - four years on from his shock death at 41 in a California helicopter crash

Lakers hero Pau Gasol sat with Kobe Bryant's daughter Natalia - his goddaughter - for Thursday night's game against Denver Nuggets, hours after a ceremony unveiling a statue honoring her late father had been held by the NBA team.

Doc Rivers is officially announced as the new head coach of the Milwaukee Bucks... and he could take charge of his first game against the Denver Nuggets on Monday

Rivers will be formally introduced on Saturday, and he could take charge of his first game against the Denver Nuggets on Monday, according to ESPN.

LA's SoFi Stadium 'makes last-ditch attempt to host 2026 World Cup final', despite the venue 'being ruled out by FIFA for any game at the tournament as it fails to meet capacity and pitch requirements'

The stadium was thought to be the one of the final three contenders for the honor of hosting the final, however, it was reported that it had been tossed aside by FIFA altogether due to regulation issues.

Nikola Jokic lifts Nuggets to emotional win over the East-leading Celtics after getting loving message from his late mentor, Dejan Milojevic, relayed to him posthumously after the Warriors assistant coach's fatal heart attack

Nikola Jokic lifted the Denver Nuggets to an inspirational win over the East-leading Boston Celtics on Friday night as he continues to mourn the death of his beloved ex-coach, Dejan Milojevic.

Joel Embiid claims MVP rival Nikola Jokic is 'the best in the league', despite the Sixers star dropping 41 points in duel with the reigning NBA champions

Following the 76ers' 126-121 win over Dallas, Embiid revealed to reporters that he told Jokic that the Nuggets' big man was 'the best player in the league', as he pulled him in for a hug.

Carmelo Anthony SLAMS former team the Denver Nuggets for trying to 'erase' his legacy by giving star center Nikola Jokic his previously worn No.15 jersey: 'It was a petty maneuver'

The 39-year-old, former forward is considered one of the most prolific Nuggets of all time after having played in Denver for eight seasons from 2003 to 2011 and making three All-Star teams.

Nuggets star Nikola Jokic sinks the Warriors with incredible game-winning three-pointer at the buzzer as the Serbian center is mobbed by his teammates after coming up clutch

A Nikola Jokic 40-footer as the buzzer sounded hit the backboard and swished as the Denver Nuggets stunned the Golden State Warriors 130-127 on Thursday night in San Francisco.

Nikola Jokic reveals he wants 'nobody to know me' and vows to not have a mobile phone when he retires as the reigning NBA champion admits his fame makes him 'feel sad'

The Serbian star seemed apparently unhappy with the limelight he received after his Denver Nuggets team won the NBA Finals - complaining about having to attend a championship parade.

Nuggets forward Aaron Gordon set to be out for 'some time' after being 'bitten by a DOG on Christmas Day'... leaving him with serious injuries to his face and hand that required 21 stitches

Denver Nuggets forward Aaron Gordon will be away from the team for an undetermined period after being bitten by a dog on Christmas Day.

Mic'd-up Warriors star Steph Curry enjoys heartwarming festive moment with camera operator before game against Nikola Jokic and the Nuggets

'I always feel like we should be able to meet the guy or girl that's gotta be on the camera and follow me or whoever else is mic'd up down here the whole game,' Curry said during warmups.

Reigning NBA champion Nikola Jokic LEAVES Nike in shock move to Chinese brand 361 Degrees as he wears new footwear for the first time in Nuggets' win over the Raptors

'The Joker' wore his brand new sneakers - the 361 Degrees Big3 Future CQT, for the first time in a 113-104 win against the Toronto Raptors on Wednesday. He scored 31 pts and had 16 rebounds.

REVEALED: ESPN announcers for its annual NBA Christmas Day bonanza when LeBron James' Lakers renew rivalry with the Celtics and the Knicks play on December 25 for the 56th time

LeBron James will be appearing in his record 18th Christmas Day game when his Los Angeles Lakers host the rival Boston Celtics during ESPN's quintoupleheader.

That's one word for it! Detroit Pistons coach Monty Williams laments 'deflating' run of losses - after woeful NBA strugglers recorded a franchise record 22ND STRAIGHT defeat against the Philadelphia 76ers

Joel Embiid scored 35 points and Tyrese Maxey added 19 as the Philadelphia 76ers became the latest team to thrash Detroit - taking their losing streak to a new franchise record.

Noah Lyles doubles down on comment that NBA winners are not 'world champions' - and insists he only received a backlash now that he's the fastest man on the planet

EXCLUSIVE BY DAVID COVERDALE IN MONACO: The USA sprinter sparked a row with leading NBA players with remarks he made in his press conference after defending his 200m title.

NBA legend Carmelo Anthony reveals he had the chance to play for the New Orleans Pelicans before choosing to retire: 'That would have been that jersey hide that'

NBA legend Carmelo Anthony revealed that he received several offers to continue his basketball career, with the most notable one coming from the New Orleans Pelicans.

Clippers star Russell Westbrook rows with ANOTHER angry fan during loss against the Nuggets... just seven months after heated exchange with a Suns supporter in the playoffs

The male fan was in the row behind the courtside seats at Crypto.com Arena. He pointed his fingers at his head while yelling in Westbrook's direction.

Victor Wembanyama's enormous hands leave fellow rookie Jalen Pickett stunned during pre-game intro: Nuggets guard says Spurs star's 'middle finger came up to' his forearm

An exact measurement of Victor Wembanyama's hands wasn't recorded at the 2023 NBA Draft combine, but it's safe to say the 7-foot-4 San Antonio Spurs star has some fairly large mitts.

LeBron James' Lakers jersey from last month is expected to sell for $60,000 at an NBA auction... but can you guess which player's vest is set to fetch the highest price?

LeBron James' jersey from last month has been put up for auction - but one NBA player's uniform is going for even more money than The King's.

LeBron passed by Jokic for fourth-most triple-doubles in NBA history

Jokic notched his 108th triple-double with 35 points, 14 rebounds and 12 assists as the Denver Nuggets defeated the New Orleans Pelicans 134-116 on Monday night.

LeBron James is passed by Nikola Jokic for the fourth-most triple-doubles in NBA history as Nuggets star registers No 108 in win over Pelicans to pass Lakers icon and Jason Kidd

Jokic notched his 108th triple-double with 35 points, 14 rebounds and 12 assists as the Denver Nuggets defeated the New Orleans Pelicans 134-116 on Monday night.

Nuggets center DeAndre Jordan dresses up as Taylor Swift for Halloween ahead of team flight

Denver Nuggets center DeAndre Jordan celebrated Halloween by dressing up as Taylor Swift, the girlfriend of Kansas City Chiefs tight end Travis Kelce.

LeBron James says Lakers 'don't give a s***' about criticism of Anthony Davis after mixed performance in opening night loss to the Nuggets: 'We don't care, AD does not care'

The Los Angeles Lakers opened their season on Tuesday night with a 119-107 loss to the Denver Nuggets - and many on social media were quick to criticize one LA star for his off night.

Phoenix Suns are stripped of 2024 second-round pick by NBA for tampering violations on free-agent center Drew Eubanks

The second-round pick for next year's draft originally belonged to the Denver Nuggets but Phoenix acquired it as part of a trade this offseason with Orlando.

Charles Barkley presses Adam Silver on NBA's recent 'disturbing' domestic violence incidents before fumbling commissioner claims 'we're not looking to compete against other leagues' to be at forefront of issue

Along with his TNT crew, Barkley spoke with NBA commissioner Adam Silver ahead of the Denver Nuggets' ring ceremony. This was when Barkley went off-script to address his concerns.

LeBron James turns up to Lakers' opener against the Nuggets in $28,000 Louis Vuitton outfit to kickstart his 21st NBA season

LeBron James wore an eye-catching outfit worth more than $28,000 of Louis Vuitton before the NBA season opener between the Los Angeles Lakers and the defending champion Denver.

REVEALED: Touching details behind Denver Nuggets' unique championship ring

After a long offseason, the Nuggets finally received the rings to commemorate their 53-29 season and 16-4 postseason run to the franchise's first title. Jason Arasheben designed the rings with this in mind.

Brendan Malone dies at 81: Long-time NBA and NCAA coach, and the father of the Nuggets' Michael Malone, is remembered as a 'great man' who had a 'profound' impact on his pupils

Brendan Malone, the long-time NBA coach and father of Denver Nuggets coach Michael Malone, has died at 81. The Nuggets revealed the news Tuesday without specifying a cause of death.

Deion Sanders isn't on Nikola Jokic's radar: Nuggets' Serbian star admits he's clueless about Coach Prime as reporters pepper his teammates with questions about Colorado football

Nikola Jokic spent months focused on Serbian horse racing, only to return to the US to find that the state of Colorado has become engulfed in college football mania since Deion Sanders' arrival

NBA's Kevin Love partners with Sotheby's to curate upcoming contemporary art auction in New York, with Heat star overseeing roughly $7m in photos, paintings, and sculptures

'I started collecting to fuel my constant pursuit for curiosity and it's taught me to take things as they come without fear or judgment,' said Love, who lost in the NBA Finals with Miami against Denver.
